special.name: Recurve Bow
special.desc: %i:scaleAS% +10% Attack Speed

special.name: Obsidian Cleaver
special.desc:
Damage dealt 30% Shreds and 30% Sunders enemies for 15 seconds.

Your team gains 8.0% Attack Damage and 8 Ability Power.

​​[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor

special.name: Virtue of the Martyr
special.desc:
Every 5 seconds, heal your team for 7% of their max Health. When the holder dies, the healing increases to 14% max Health for 2 extra heals.

Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Tracker_Value1@

​​[Support item]

special.name: Tear of the Goddess
special.desc: %i:scaleMana% +15 Mana

special.desc:
Once per combat at 40% Health, become invulnerable and untargetable for 3 seconds.

special.name: Negatron Cloak
special.desc: %i:scaleMR% +20 Magic Resist

special.name: Knight's Vow
special.desc:
Combat start: Grant 200 Health and 15.0% Omnivamp to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

​​[Support item]

special.name: Masterwork Upgrade
special.desc: Use on a unit to open an armory containing Radiant versions of that unit's craftable completed items. Upgrade the item you choose to its Radiant equivalent, and unequip it.

special.name: Luden's Tempest
special.desc: 100% of overkill damage plus 100 is dealt as magic damage to the three enemies nearest the target.

special.name: Spectral Cutlass
special.desc: Combat start: Teleport the holder to the mirrored hex on the enemy's side of the board. After 8 seconds, the holder returns to their original location.

special.name: Damage Amp
special.desc: Cause this unit to deal  @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_UnitProperty_Debug@% increased damage. Does not stack. Lasts until the unit is deconstructed.

special.name: Sparring Gloves
special.desc: +20 Critical Strike Chance

special.name: Rapid Firecannon
special.desc: Gain +1 Attack Range, increased by 1 whenever the holder kills an enemy.

special.name: Golden Item Remover
special.desc: Use on a champion to unequip all items as many times as you want. Converts all future Magnetic Removers to Reforgers.

special.name: Sniper's Focus
special.desc: Gain %i:scaleRange% 2 Attack Range. Gain 9.0% Damage Amp against a target for each hex between the holder and the target.

special.name: Unstable Treasure Chest
special.desc:
When the holder dies, the 4 highest percent health allies gain a temporary completed item.

​​[Support item]

special.name: Taunt
special.desc: Taunt all enemies who are in range to attack the target.

special.name: Lesser Champion Duplicator
special.desc:
Use on a 3-cost champion or less to create a 1-star copy on your bench.

special.name: Zz'Rot Portal

On death, a Voidspawn arises, Taunting nearby enemies. The Voidspawn has massively reduced effectiveness when created by a summoned unit.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter

special.name: The Eternal Flame
special.desc:
While the holder is alive, all enemies are 33% Wounded and all allies gain 8.0% Damage Amp. This effect refreshes every 5 seconds.

​​[Support item]
Wound: Reduces healing received

special.name: Lightshield Crest
special.desc:
Every 3 seconds, Shields the lowest percent Health ally for 70% of the holder's combined Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds.

On death grants this shield to all allies.

special.name: Death's Defiance
special.desc:
50% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over 4 seconds as non-lethal damage.
